column5: I was trying to read the bottom of page 8... or was it the top???    Have fun, and keep fishin' folks.

Probably the bottom left hand corner Rob! That would be the top right hand to you...   "Immediate" for OOS fish means right then and NOW... how can it be interpreted differently for slots "immediate" release? Dumb.. but it's their typing.. not mine. They should have.. must be release immediately after verifying length, but they don't.
OK, now you have gone too far, to me a paradox is what you need when you own 4 boats.... Very valid point BTW.

Yes it certainly muddies the waters. Immediately release a fish...by using your Steve Austin bionic eye and measuring the length. Remember the regs are a summary and not the actual laws. The law does not say you must immediately release the fish, the law says you may not be in possession. Now...your homework is to go and read what possession means.
